Synopsis: Retrieves Group Policy Object (GPO) links based on specified criteria.
Description: This function retrieves GPO links based on various parameters such as ADObject, Filter, Linked, Site, etc. It provides flexibility in searching for GPO links within Active Directory.

Examples.Title: EXAMPLE 1
Examples.Code:
Get-GPOZaurrLink -ADObject $ADObject -Linked 'All'
Description
-----------
Retrieves all linked GPOZaurr links for the specified Active Directory object(s).

Examples.Title: EXAMPLE 2
Examples.Code:
Get-GPOZaurrLink -Filter "(objectClass -eq 'organizationalUnit')" -SearchBase 'CN=Configuration,DC=ad,DC=evotec,DC=xyz'
Description
-----------
Retrieves GPOZaurr links based on the specified filter and search base.
